caption.p:
Effect of oral administration of the ODSO and the ascorbic acid on blood glucose level before (day 1) and after (day 7) Allx intraperitoneal injection in mice. The values are presented in mean ± SEM. n = 6-10, ### P < 0.001 compared to the control group and
∗∗∗
P < 0.001 compared to the Allx control group.
